item.description:
My calendar's been awfully empty this week! But my social distress is your gain!

Join me for a bike ride on the East Bay bike path this Saturday, the 21st of November, at 10:15AM, starting from Bristol, RI.

This will be a bike path ride - no streets, no cars, no worries. As usual, our speed on the bike path will be *significantly slower* than when we ride on roads.

If it is raining â€“ I will reschedule for another day.

The East Bay bike path is 14.5 miles of paved bike path from Bristol to Providence. It's pretty flat except for a hill or two at the Providence side.

Meet us at Colt State Park in Bristol, Rhode Island. We'll start from the parking lot across the street from the North Cemetary on Asylum Road.

PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE remember to take my cell phone number: 401-699-7304 in case you can't find us. As usual, I will be sporting my signature red road bike. I drive a red car.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red road bike. Try my cell: 401-699-7304.
item.name: East Bay Bike path - 29 miles, SLOW PACE
